title: The Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts 6/19/21
itunes:title: The Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts 6/19/21
description:
The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. Colin rants about why the Aaron Rodgers/Packers dispute seems so intense (:45), why people need to get over these NBA injuries (3:35), and why sports TV ratings don't actually matter (6:30). Gary Payton joins the show and lets us know what Ben Simmons needs to do to save his career in Philly, and Gary goes right back at Michael Jordan about his comments from "The Last Dance" (10:20), plus Doug Gottlieb on why he doesn't like the new college football playoff proposal (25:28). Make sure to follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates, and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
